I called ahead and waited 45 minutes before arriving and they cooked the food for two seconds and tried to charge me for half the food I ordered as if I didn‚Äôt know what I said . I did not even waste my time giving them the cash. Walked out.

I had the General Tso‚Äôs Chicken ‚Äî and it was great. Just $10 for lunch with plenty of chicken, super crispy with a sweet, tangy sauce. Came with a generous wonton soup on the side too.

I ordered from here yesterday. It used to be so good, but I‚Äôm not sure what happened. I ordered shrimp and broccoli, and the shrimp smelt so fishy and tasted so bad, I couldn‚Äôt finish my food. My food was entirely bland. Even the other dishes (the chicken wings and sweet plantains, chicken wings and French fries) were bland, dry, and just overall not good. The only thing that was, was the garlic chicken wings, but that wasn‚Äôt enough to save anything.

Not only that, but delivery took over an hour. I was going to end up cancelling (which I should have done), but I wanted to give them a chance. They didn‚Äôt want to provide me the delivery persons number despite me asking. I won‚Äôt order again from here. Seems like I‚Äôll just be fond of the memories of it being good in the past rather than what transpired last night. 50+ dollars, absolutely wasted.

My first review since the start of COVID-19. Never thought this year will be so much different. Anyway, I was pretty bummed that a lot of places had to close down but I am happy that that this Chinese restaurant will live to tell another‚Ä¶
I ordered crab sticks and found a piece of plastic inside of the meet people please be careful with your kids .

For six dollars, you can get a variety of choices from the lunch special menu, with your choice of rice and drink.  You also get good portions; often, I have leftovers to eat for the next day, or choose to share.  For those who are health conscious, they offer some alternatives.  Most of them are steamed vegetables and meats.  Overall, most of the meals are decent to good.

The decor is not great.  While there is a place to sit and you get a decent view outside, (which is better than most fast food Chinese restaurants), it is only a few seats by a window with plastic chairs.  It is okay if you must sit down for a second while shopping in the Hub, but don't expect to bring a date or a group of friends here.

For service, you do not have to wait long for your food for short orders; more complicated meals will take time.  They also deliver in the neighborhood within a reasonable amount of time.  Make sure your order is clear though when ordering over the phone.  While I have not tried it yet, they also offer catering services.

Overall, it is a good place for a quick meal on the go, and the service is good.

My favorite Chinese food restaurant in this area. They are one of the few that have brown rice on the menu, delicious food, and delivery is always on point. They don't have a real sitting area, but take out is fine for me.

Ive been a customer for over 15 and have moved 3 times. And still have them deliver food. Always hot and delicious. Only take out chinese place I‚Äôll eat from. Not saying others are bad just as a personal preference for me they‚Äôre the best üòä‚Ä¶

I order food a lot in this place and they give hard a time with a free can of soda, I always order the same food and my total comes to over 15 dollars, this one time I ordered my food over the phone and forgot to add an egg and One time I forgot to put an egg and the man on the phone was complaining about ‚Äúno can of soda‚Äù but when I always order from there I get a free can of soda with anyone else on the phone. I added an egg to make sure my order was over 15$ and he still charged me for the other can of soda so I just left it like that, so don‚Äôt ever ask for a free can of soda because they will have problems with you over the phone and u will have to argue just for a dumb soda I do not recommend to get a free soda from them it will cause complications and they will spit in your food just for a can of soda.

I have mixed feelings about this place.  I honestly have a love hate relationship with this establishment.  Kind of like staying at a two star hotel during the Olympics in Sochi.

It can get pricey.  I don't mind expensive as long as I'm getting quality.  The quality really didn't stand out. To me it seems like you're paying for the ambience and not the quality of the food.  This can be a bummer if you're hard-core foodie.

I won't lie this place is beautiful!  I love the decour.  I would give this place 4.5 stars for the decour alone.  This place gets off the riche vibe like you should be served caviar off a 24 karat gold plate with an ivory spoon. I would give this place 4.5 stars for the decour.  However one cannot survive on ambiance alone.

Okay now the food.  Borscht is one of my favorite dishes.  I will take it above any other dish that is offered.  There borscht was okay, I had higher expectations.  The Chicken Kiev have and the beed stroganoff was ok.

If my daddy had me up with the trust fund, I had a rich ex-husband,or sugar daddy you can bet I would definitely eat here often !
The food was very good. The delivery was quick and the food was delivered 30 minutes after the initial order was placed. I will definitely order from them again.

Very racist place... I‚Äôve had delivery here many times and now they refuse to deliver to my house which is literally 10 minutes away.  They now swear that they have never delivered to my address. I will be reporting them to the Better Business Bureau.
Straight trash food is disgusting. The wings tasted like fried soup i don't think they change the oil very often definitely regret eating from there.
So far so good. Actually their wonton soup is the best i had in years. Thr soup was a nice color lite brown. Not like some some ehen it looks like chicken noodle soup & i got 5 wontons.

I call for delivery at 8 pm, about 9 pm I call to see what is going on and they told me it was in the way... At 9:50pm I a call again and they said that I never ordered or call them. I work in a parking garage and I can't go for food,‚Ä¶
